named-native-query.name: OAuthToken.getOAuthToken
named-native-query.query: SELECT t.*, c.*, u.* from oAuthTokens t inner join users u on t.userId = u.userId inner join oAuthClients c on c.clientId = t.clientId where t.refreshToken = :refreshToken and TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, t.ts, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= :expirationInterval

named-native-query.name: OAuthNonce.getOAuthNonce
named-native-query.query: SELECT n.*, u.* from oAuthNonces n inner join users u on n.userId = u.userId where n.code = :code and n.redirectUri = :redirectUri and n.clientId = :clientId and TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, n.ts, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= :expirationInterval
